articles.title: Von Miller to join Commanders on one-year deal, source says
articles.description: Veteran outside linebacker Von Miller will sign a one-year deal with the Commanders, but the two sides are still "finalizing terms," a source said.
articles.content:
Open Extended Reactions
Eight-time Pro Bowl outside linebacker Von Miller is signing with the Washington Commanders, he posted Wednesday night on social media.
Miller will sign a one-year deal, but the two sides are still "finalizing terms," a source... [1950 chars]
